targets.query:
from(bucket: "us-southeast")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "co2_intensity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location == "Southern Company Services")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "us-southeast")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "co2_intensity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location == "Southern Company Services")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "us-southeast")
  |> range(start: -30d)  // Get all data over the last 30 days
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "co2_intensity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> group()  // Group all data together (remove any subgrouping)
  |> stddev(column: "_value")  // Calculate the standard deviation for the entire dataset
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with three_sigma: r._value * 3.0  // Multiply standard deviation by 3 to get 3-sigma
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["three_sigma"])  // Only keep the 3-sigma value
  |> yield(name: "three_sigma")

from(bucket: "us-southeast")
  |> range(start: -30d)  // Get data for the last 30 days
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "co2_intensity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)  // Aggregate data by day
  |> group()
  |> mean(column: "_value")  // Calculate the mean CO2 intensity for the last 30 days
  |> yield(name: "30_day_average")

from(bucket: "us-southeast")
  |> range(start: -30d)  // Adjust time range as needed
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "co2_intensity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)  // Aggregate by 5-minute intervals
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Atlanta us-southeast CO2 Emissions (gCO2e  per kWh)
